room_title: Escape room "The Seance" by Escape Again Rooms in Houston
review: This the best escape room. The staff was super friendly and helpful. They are very supportive and positive. The room is extremely detailed and the storyline is very believable and entertaining. Morgan is the best. He came to our rescue many times. Can't wait to come back with my kids. We had a blast.

room_title: Escape room "The Seance" by Escape Again Rooms in Houston
review: We did the Seance room. The puzzles were challenging and fun and the owners were accommodating when one of our party was running late. We will definitely return to do the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Seance" by Escape Again Rooms in Houston
review: This was such a fun, exciting experience! We did this with a group of friends for my birthday. It was the first visit for all nine of us! The seance room was awesome with challenging clues! The employees were helpful and friendly. Loved everything about our experience!! We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Seance" by Escape Again Rooms in Houston
review: Had a blast in the seance room! Cool staff, too. Thanks!

room_title: Escape room "The Seance" by Escape Again Rooms in Houston
review: The Seance was AWESOME! It's challenging without being frustrating. My middle and high schoolers loved it!
